name: WESTERN HOME WH Calming Soft Round Dog & Cat Bed, Anti-Anxiety Donut Cuddler Warming Cozy Fluffy Faux Fur Plush Cushion Bed for Small Medium Dogs and Cats (20"/24"/27"/30"), Light Grey
short_description: 【HIGH-QUALITY MATERIALS】The pet calming dog bed is made of durable luxurious faux fur. The interior is filled with super-soft environmentally friendly PP cotton. It has always provided soft support for the pet, which relieves the pet muscle and joint pain

【COMFORTABLE SLEEP】This dog donut cuddler bed has a circular design, surrounded by bulges around the cat, which is very suitable for pets who like to curl up. The dog round bed provides a full sense of security for your pet.

【SUITABLE SIZE】Three sizes are available for your choice. We recommend a 20-inch dog bed for small dogs (up to 11 pounds), a 24-inch dog round bed (up to 25 pounds), and a 27-inch dog calming bed (up to 35 pounds), it is recommended that you measure the size of your pet before buying.

【MULTIFUNCTIONAL BOTTOM】 The cat and dog cushion bed has an anti-slip PVC dot fabric bottom. The anti-slip design at the bottom of the fluffy dog bed can provide better stability, and your dog can play and rest securely in the calming dog bed.

【EASY TO CARE】The anti-anxiety dog bed can be machine washed. You only need to put the entire cat and dog bed in the washing machine and dry it at low heat after washing. It is recommended to wash and dry separately. Your dog will regain a softer dog calming bed.Notice: Please leave it for a while after receiving the calming dog bed, it will return to shape after shaking.

name: Calming Pet Bed with Water-Resistant Inner Liner – Anti-Anxiety Donut Dog & Cat Bed with Removable Washable Cover – Supportive Plush Nest, Non-Slip & Cushion Protection – Small, Grey
short_description: Wrap Your Pet in Plush Comfort: The WisQoo Calming Donut Pet Bed features ultra-soft faux shag fabric and an overstuffed filling blend of PP fiber and foam that offers more cushioning than typical beds. It creates a cozy, cloud-like nest your pet will love to curl up in for naps and restful sleep.

Designed to Reduce Anxiety and Promote Calm: Its round, donut-shaped design with raised bolsters provides head and neck support, creating a secure environment that helps soothe nervous pets and relieve anxiety, making it ideal for dogs and cats who seek comfort and security.

Built to Last with Premium Materials: Crafted with durable fabrics and a resilient PP fiber and foam blend filling, this pet bed maintains its shape and softness even after extended use. The water-resistant inner liner protects the filling from spills and accidents, helping keep the bed fresh longer.
Easy to Clean with Removable Cover: The zippered faux shag cover is removable and machine washable, making cleanup simple and convenient so your pet’s bed stays fresh, fluffy, and inviting.

Multiple Sizes and Stylish Design – Available in Small, Medium, and Large sizes to fit all types of pets, the WisQoo Calming Donut Pet Bed also features a modern, neutral color that complements any home décor while offering your pet a perfect place to relax.

name: Fluffy Orthopedic Dog Bed for Large & Extra Large Dogs, Calming Plush Sofa Bed with Curved Bolster Support and Egg-Crate Foam Base, 43" Cozy Oval Pet Donut Bed with Washable Cover, Gray
short_description: Fluffy Orthopedic Dog Bed – When my dog finally crashes after playtime, I want them sinking into ultra-soft long plush—not a thin mat. This calming orthopedic dog bed (great for medium & large breeds) helps anxious pups settle faster for all-night, joint-friendly sleep.

Curved Bolster Sofa Bed – Three-sided bolsters hug like a sofa, giving wraparound security and gentle neck support—perfect for curl-up sleepers or head-on-pillow loungers. It’s the cozy large dog couch / puppy sofa comfort they choose over our furniture every time.

Supportive Egg-Crate Foam Base – Orthopedic egg-crate foam distributes weight evenly to relieve pressure on hips and elbows—no more bottoming-out pads for big dogs or seniors. Works as a kennel or crate cushion and as an indoor sleeping pad; durable support from puppy to XL.

Modern & Durable Design – We love our living room looking put-together. The stylish bouclé (boucle) fabric blends with modern décor like a chic dog sofa bed—so you won’t feel the need to hide a bulky pet lounger when guests arrive. Durable, cozy, photo-ready.

Easy Care & Practical Details – Real life = shedding, drool, and spills. The removable, machine-washable cover plus waterproof inner liner protect the orthopedic foam; the non-slip bottom keeps the bed in place on wood or tile. Ideal for multi-dog homes and daily use.

name: Donut Dog Bed - Premium Comfort for Anxiety Relief - Fluffy & Calming Design with Ultra-Plush Support | Cozy Round Dog Bed with Super Soft Circle Style (Dark Grey, Medium)
short_description: Wrap Your Pet in Cloud- Like Comfort - Our Petloox dog donut bed is crafted with ultra-soft, shaggy plush materials that pets love to sink into, offering warmth and coziness for truly restful naps. Designed in sizes ranging from Small to XL, it provides a snug, inviting spot for tiny puppies, toy breeds, and larger dogs alike, making it the perfect everyday retreat for any furry friend.

Built to Last, Exceptional Value - Crafted with high-quality, durable materials, our Petloox dog bed round offers unbeatable longevity and resilience. Designed to outlast and outperform other brands, it provides lasting comfort and incredible value for both you and your pet! Available in multiple sized options, including Small, Medium, and Large, to ensure the perfect size for every pet.

Calming Haven for Anxious Pets - Our Petloox anxiety dog bed is designed to create a soothing, secure environment that helps reduce pet anxiety. Its cozy, nest-like shape promotes relaxation, making it the perfect retreat for pets who need extra comfort and reassurance. This cuddler bed is ideal for dogs and even your cat, offering a furry, ultra-soft escape from daily stress.

Elegant Design That Complements Any Home - Our Petloox dog calming beds aren't just cozy retreats for your pets, they're stylish additions to your home decor. With their modern, minimalist design and premium plush fabric, these circular, shaggy round dog beds seamlessly blend into any space, making comfort look as good as it feels.

3-Year Warranty & A Thoughtful Gift for Pet Lovers - Our Petloox calming bed for dogs makes a thoughtful gift for small, medium, and large dogs. Backed by a durable 3-year guarantee, it ensures lasting comfort and premium quality. Whether you’re shopping for a puppy, a large breed, or even a cat, this bed is a versatile option for every pet owner.

name: BALANCE Calming Dog Bed for Medium Sized Dogs, 30 Inches Oval Washable Pet Bed with Sides, Orthopedic Pet Couch Sofa with Non-Slip Bottom, Gray
short_description: Size Reminder: To ensure the best fit, please refer to the size guide and measure your pet’s length from head to base of tail before purchasing. Due to compression, slight measurement errors may occur, but always within 5% tolerance

This 30-inch round calming pet bed is designed to promote deeper, more restful sleep for cats and medium dogs up to 30 lbs. Ideal for breeds such as Cocker Spaniel Beagle Boston Terrier Shiba inu Corgi French Bulldog, and all Toy Breeds, etc

Calming & Anti-Anxiety: The fuzzy oval dog bed features a comfortable supportive edge that offers excellent support for your pet's neck and head. This "C-shaped" bolster dog bed cater to pets who love to curl up, ensure your pet feels safe and snug
Waterproof Protection for Durability: The waterproof layer in the sleeping area fully protects the filling from spills and accidents, ensuring the pet bed remains fresh and durable over time

Excellent Support for Restful Sleep: The BALANCE orthopedic dog bed is crafted with high-density egg crate foam to evenly distribute weight, easing joint and muscle fatigue. The padded bolsters offer head and neck support, aligning the spine for a cozy, restful sleep experience
Non-Shedding Cozy Fabric: This dog couch is crafted from non-shedding plush material, which helps keep your home cleaner by preventing loose fibers from causing extra mess

Secure and Stable Design: Featuring a nonskid bottom, this comfy dog bed stays in place, whether on tile or hardwood floors. This ensures your pet's safety and comfort, allowing them to move freely without slipping
Easy Care: With the removable cushion, this fluffy dog bed is easy to maintain. Simply machine washable doggy bed entirely in cold water and on a gentle cycle for a like-new restoration

name: EHEYCIGA Washable Large Dog Bed for Crate 35x23 Inch, Reversible Kennel Pad for Dogs Weight Up to 45 lbs, Plush and Comfy Pet Sleeping Mat, Grey
short_description: Reversible Design for Year-Round Comfort: Features 3D soft faux fur (winter & autumn) and breathable linen-like fabric (spring & summer), with distinct textures for year-round use. The winter-autumn side is ultra-soft, comfortable, non-shedding—soothing dogs, easing anxiety, improving sleep. The spring-summer side is cool, breathable, non-lint-sticking, solving faux fur's stuffiness.

Luxurious Filling Support: Filled with high-grade polyester, secured by 4 locking holes, it offers strong elastic support and long-lasting resilience. Fits dogs' neck, shoulder, waist & hip curves, supporting bones, reducing pressure, relieving joint pain, soreness and arthritis.

Multiple Sizes & Versatile Uses: Offers 5 crate-compatible sizes (S to XXL-Crate), weight capacities 25 lbs to 110 lbs, suitable for all dog breeds. Perfect for use with kennels, crates, or as a standalone bed, this portable pet mattress adapts to both indoor and outdoor settings.

Machine-Washable: The dog bed mat is hand/machine washable for easy care. Machine wash cold, tumble dry low; front-loading washers recommended (top-loading may damage). XL needs washer capacity >3.5 cu ft, XXL >4.5 cu ft.
Attention: Comes in vacuum-compressed packaging. Before dogs use it, pat the mat or let it sit 24-48 hours to restore fluffiness.
